about.title: About BTC Board
about.description: BTC Board is a premium PVC Board product manufactured by CV. Bagong Teknindo Cemerlang since 2018. We use high-quality selected materials to provide the best products for our customers. In addition to using selected materials, BTC Board is processed with advanced machinery and can be shaped according to customer requirements.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To become a solution for contractors and architects in providing quality PVC Board materials.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.breakthrough: Breakthrough: Always innovate in presenting quality PVC Board products that can be a solution in design and construction
mission.teamwork: Teamwork: Strengthen relationships between employees by respecting each other and creating a safe work environment
mission.excellence: Customer Excellence: Always provide the best for customers in terms of products and services
mission.selling: Best Selling: Become the #1 brand and dominate the PVC Board market by providing quality products at competitive prices
mission.outstanding: Outstanding: Always maintain good work performance in product innovation, quality and work efficiency
mission.accountability: Accountability: Become a brand that can be trusted and relied upon by the community
mission.responsible: Responsible: Responsible and caring for the welfare of society and the environment
mission.development: Development: Always develop product innovations that are relevant to customer needs

waterproof.title: Water Resistant
waterproof.description: BTC Board is a water-resistant product that will not be damaged when exposed to water. Can replace other building materials that are not water resistant, such as plywood, multiplex, gypsum, and many more.

termiteProof.title: Termite Resistant
termiteProof.description: BTC Board is a termite-resistant product, and can be used as a replacement for building materials such as plywood, multiplex, gypsum, and many more.

recyclable.title: Recyclable
recyclable.description: BTC Board is made from a plastic mixture that allows it to be processed and reused, so it can be said that the BTC Board manufacturing process is zero waste.

smooth.title: Smooth Surface
smooth.description: BTC Board has a smooth surface making the work process easier. With a smooth surface, BTC Board is easy to carve and laminate.

easyCarving.title: Easy to Carve
easyCarving.description: BTC Board is easy to carve with various carving machines, one of which is a CNC machine. Our CNC machine has good accuracy and can cut BTC Board according to customer requirements.

easyWork.title: Easy Processing
easyWork.description: BTC Board can be processed using common carpentry tools, so customers don't need to be confused in finding the right tools to process BTC Board.

durable.title: Durable
durable.description: BTC Board has strong durability so it can be used repeatedly. Therefore BTC Board can be used as formwork, furniture, and many more.

applications.title: Product Applications
applications.furniture: Can be used for furniture such as cabinets, tables, chairs, kitchen sets, toilet cubicles, and many more
applications.partition: Can be used as partition walls, wall coverings or ceilings
applications.signage: Can be used for signage and displays such as making nameplates, billboards and promotional displays
applications.decorative: Can be used to make decorative panels, interior and exterior design elements
applications.divider: Can be used as flexible and elegant room dividers

products.title: Explore Our Products
products.description: Discover our range of high-quality PVC boards engineered for durability, versatility, and a clean finish—ideal for modern construction and interior projects.

cta.title: Need Specifications or Pricing?
cta.description: Tell us about your project and we’ll recommend the right board, thickness, and finish—then send a detailed quote.

modal.title: Book a Consultation
modal.callExperts: Talk directly with our product specialist.

2d.name: 2D PVC Board
2d.tagline: Versatile flat boards for universal use
2d.description: Flat-surface PVC boards suitable for furniture, wall cladding, ceilings, signage, and more. Available in multiple colors and sizes.

3d.name: 3D PVC Board
3d.description: Three-dimensional surfaces for decorative panels, wall features, ceilings, and room dividers.

laminating.name: Laminating PVC Board
laminating.tagline: Premium laminated finish for high-wear areas
laminating.description: PVC boards with durable laminated surfaces for furniture, partitions, and signage where a premium finish is required.

polos.name: Polos PVC Board
polos.description: Plain-surface PVC boards ideal for paint, lamination, or custom treatments.

innovation.title: Innovation at BTC Board
innovation.subtitle: Leading the Way in PVC Solutions

features.description1: BTC Board is a water-resistant product that will not be damaged if exposed to water. BTC Board can be used as a substitute for other building materials that are not water-resistant, such as plywood, particle board, gypsum, and many more.
features.description2: BTC Board is a termite-resistant product and can be used as a substitute for building materials such as plywood, particle board, gypsum, and many more.
features.description3: BTC Board is made from a plastic blend that allows it to be processed and reused, making the production process of BTC Board zero waste.
features.description4: BTC Board has a smooth surface that facilitates the working process. With a smooth surface, BTC Board is easy to carve and laminate.
features.description5: BTC Board can be processed using common woodworking tools, so customers do not need to worry about finding the right tools to process BTC Board.
features.description7: BTC Board has strong durability so it can be used repeatedly. Therefore, BTC Board can be used as Formwork, Furniture, and much more.

footer.description: BTC Board is a premium PVC Board product manufactured by CV. Bagong Teknindo Cemerlang since 2018. We use high-quality selected materials to provide the best products for our customers.
